What do we mean with monitoring?
We collect the minimum information needed

SafeCircle monitors simple activity signals—like when you unlock your phone, turn on a light, or interact with connected devices. We don't record what you're doing, who you're talking to, or what's on your screen.

Think of it like a motion sensor in a room: it knows someone is present and active, but nothing about what they're actually doing. That's all SafeCircle needs to know you're going about your normal routine.

We use these signals to learn your typical daily patterns—when you're usually active, when you typically rest. If that pattern continues normally, your trusted contacts see a simple "all is well" confirmation. If the pattern breaks unexpectedly, they're notified.

Cameras watching you, GPS tracking your exact location, recording conversations, logging websites you visit, or monitoring who you communicate with. It's invasive and creates a detailed record of your life.

Simple signals that indicate activity is happening—nothing about what that activity is. No cameras, no audio, no detailed tracking. Just enough to know your routine continues normally, or when it doesn't.

The key difference: Surveillance tells someone everything about your life. SafeCircle only signals whether your routine seems normal or if something might be wrong—giving you privacy while still providing reassurance.
Peace of mind for those who care about you
Your trusted contacts stay informed without being intrusive. They see just what they need to know, when they need to know it.
Your loved ones see a simple confirmation that you're active and going about your day. No details, no notifications—just quiet reassurance that everything is normal.

When something seems off, your contacts receive an alert with helpful context based on your privacy settings—like when you were last active or your location. They can reach out directly to check in or take action if needed.

Many people put off organizing or sharing health and safety info. SafeCircle lowers the threshold: it's easy to set up, runs on autopilot, and ensures loved ones know you're okay without pressure or surveillance.
Adults living alone who want independence and safety without wearing devices like emergency buttons or smartwatches
Loved ones who want reassurance but lack time for frequent check-ins or worry about being intrusive

SafeCircle learns your normal daily patterns using your phone and any smart devices you already have. It observes that activity is happening during your typical routine. Not what you're doing or where you are. SafeCircle uses minimal data collection, less than many popular apps.

Each day, when your activity matches your normal pattern, SafeCircle automatically marks you as checked in. If your trusted contacts have installed the app, they see quiet confirmation that you're going about your day. If not, no news is good news.

If your routine changes significantly (for example, no activity is detected for an unusual length of time) SafeCircle waits a period you decide, then alerts your trusted contacts via the app, SMS, WhatsApp, or email. They can reach out to you directly.
You can manually check in anytime, adjust your settings, or pause monitoring when you're traveling or your schedule changes.

Context: What this is not - section heading

English: SafeCircle alerts your contacts, not 911. It's designed for peace of mind, not crisis response.
It doesn't track health metrics, fall detection, or vital signs. It observes general activity patterns only.
No cameras, no constant tracking, no recording of what you're doing. Just pattern recognition from devices you already use.

Daily reassurance for you and loved ones
works with lights, locks, and more
No cameras, no audio, no constant tracking. SafeCircle observes simple activity patterns only, nothing personal or invasive.
Choose exactly what each trusted contact can see. Optionally share helpful information like location only when an alert is triggered.
Bank-level encryption protects everything. Only people you explicitly authorize can see what you've chosen to share.
Want even less data shared? Use push-notification-only mode: No activity data, just simple check-ins you confirm yourself.
Will I need to remember to check in daily?
No. SafeCircle works passively in the background. There are no buttons to press, no daily tasks, and nothing to remember.
Your data is encrypted with bank-level security. You control exactly who can access what, and when. Your information is never shared without your permission.
Do my trusted contacts need to install the app?
No. Your trusted contacts can receive alerts via SMS, WhatsApp, or email. Installing the app gives them access to a dashboard for reassurance, but it's completely optional.
What if I go on vacation or change my routine?
You can easily pause monitoring or adjust your routine settings anytime. SafeCircle adapts to your life, not the other way around.
How does the 14-day money-back guarantee work?

Try SafeCircle risk-free for 14 days. If you're not satisfied for any reason, simply cancel your subscription in the app within 14 days of your purchase and you'll automatically receive a full refund—no questions asked, no need to contact us.
Peace of mind for independent living.
